title: Jen Pawol Makes History as First Female MLB Umpire in Regular-Season Game
snippets: Jen Pawol made history when she became the first woman to umpire an MLB regular-season game.
Pawol worked Saturday's doubleheader between the Braves and Marlins at Truist Park and is expected to be behind the plate for Sunday's game
Jen Pawol's much-anticipated debut came as the first base umpire for Saturday's first game of a split doubleheader between the Atlanta Braves and Miami Marlins.
Jen Pawol has made history as the first female umpire to work a regular-season game in the major leagues.
titles: 'Amazing': Pawol 1st woman to umpire MLB game
WATCH: Jen Pawol makes MLB history as first female umpire to work a regular-season game
Jen Pawol breaks MLB‚Äôs gender barrier as 1st female umpire to work a regular-season game
Jen Pawol breaks gender barrier as first woman to umpire regular-season game
summary: Jen Pawol became the first female umpire in Major League Baseball (MLB) history to officiate a regular-season game. She made her historic debut during a doubleheader between the Atlanta Braves and Miami Marlins at Truist Park, serving as the first base umpire for the first game on Saturday. Pawol is also slated to be behind the plate for Sunday's game, marking a significant milestone in MLB history.

Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu faces significant opposition both domestically and internationally over the decision, as global leaders call for the area to be "flooded with aid."

Critics argue that the ban on the activist group restricts freedom of speech and assembly, particularly targeting pro-Palestine protests. Despite the government ban, protesters rallied in Parliament Square, leading to the significant police response.

This conclusion was reached after observing its unusual characteristics and applying advanced models. The star, now a hot white dwarf, provides insights into stellar evolution and the outcomes of star mergers. This finding challenges previous understandings and highlights the complex nature of star life cycles.

This phenomenon, captured using the DECam Deep View, indicates a massive gravitational interaction, where stars are being pulled from their galaxies. This finding provides new insights into the dynamics of galaxy clusters and the gravitational forces at play in the universe.

This discovery sheds light on the mysterious decline of sea star populations in the region.

title: What’s a smut peddler to do these days?
snippets: In the aftermath of itch.io pulling the sale of over 20,000 pages of adult content, the creators of that work are left feeling betrayed, exhausted, and fearful. The number of platforms that permit the sale of adult material is shrinking, and there's no guarantee the ones that remain will still permi
titles: What’s a smut peddler to do these days?

title: Encryption made for police and military radios may be easily cracked
snippets: An encryption algorithm can have weaknesses that could allow an attacker to listen in.
titles: Encryption made for police and military radios may be easily cracked

title: New adhesive surface modeled on a remora works underwater
snippets: It was tested for its ability to adhere to the inside of the digestive tract.
titles: New adhesive surface modeled on a remora works underwater
